name: Udders, Please
description:
Udders, Please: The Cow Curse Of New York

A rookie policeman meets a dog who can talk and they team up to become the best dog and human team in history to stop the illegal flow of cows into the city of new york, along the way the discover friendships and mysteries. And cows.

Contains unfunny humour and more branching paths than necessary.

Made with 100% good stock images™

It not done. Or funny. At all.
